description:
Enjoy intense action in this third-person shooter action game. Your job is to clean city of crime in mutiple missions, each one with its own goal.
The game features a fully Open World Environment. Improve your arsenal in the dedicated shop with cash you gained from previous missions.


• Visually stunning graphics, character and vehicle models
• HD quality graphics
• Completely different missions
• Thirdperson character controller
• Camera system including camera shakes
• Destructible buildings
• Bullets, explosions and area damage
• Enemy, boss and enemy vehicles smart behavior
• Hours of intense gameplay
name: Hammer 2 Reloaded
